title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.6 - Fine or suspension for pilot's ommission or refusal to perform pilotage-connected duty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.6 - Fine or suspension for pilot's ommission or refusal to perform pilotage-connected duty

State Regulations

Any pilot omitting or refusing to perform any duty connected
with pilotage, as provided by this Chapter, or by the commissioners, shall be
liable to a fine of $100, or to suspension, at the discretion of the
commissioners. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
56.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
